pullrequest.title: Subdivide large heightmaps to fix LOD and support global texture mapping

content.raw:
I'm not sure if test related files should be installed. I set it up for testing only. I think if you want to launch gazebo with files from the test media directory, you can do something like this:

1. source the setup.sh file

1. from gazebo root dir: 

        GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=`pwd`/test/:${GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH} gazebo --verbose test/worlds/heightmap_material.world

we also have a few other test worlds that cannot be launched directly unless the resource path is set.
content.html:
I'm not sure if test related files should be installed. I set it up for testing only. I think if you want to launch gazebo with files from the test media directory, you can do something like this:

  1. source the setup.sh file

  2. from gazebo root dir: 

    GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH=`pwd`/test/:${GAZEBO_RESOURCE_PATH} gazebo --verbose test/worlds/heightmap_material.world

we also have a few other test worlds that cannot be launched directly unless the resource path is set.
